title: Importing eps to Fontographer
content:
Huw   
Chank should be able to help you with this old font design tutorial. You can simply copy and paste following his directions and it should work. This guide is what I used when first starting out. It is still helpful.   
   
 [http://www.chank.com/howto/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109093649/http:/www.chank.com/howto/index.php)   
   
Jordan Davies
author: jordy
